description: Marko is HTML re-imagined as a language for building dynamic and reactive user interfaces. Just about any valid HTML is valid Marko, but Marko extends the HTML language to allow building modern applications in a declarative way: it's like HTML and JavaScript had a perfect baby that grew up to be awesome. I would like to introduce you in practice to this fascinating framework and share some best practices; I will also present my pet project based on Marko.
title: The Marko web framework as a full-fledged alternative to React
